channel.title: McMinnville|Yamhill County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in McMinnville|Yamhill County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-18 East - Cruickshank Road Jct.
item.description: OR-18 east at Cruickshank Road/To Salem Jct. Continue east on OR-18 for Newberg.

item.title: Lafayette Ave. North at OR-99W
item.description: Lafayette Ave. North at OR-99W in McMinnville. Turn left on OR-99W North for Forest Grove (via OR-47) and Portland. Turn left on OR-99W (South) for Corvallis and the Oregon Coast (via OR-18). In many places in Oregon the coast is referred to as the Oregon Coast on road signs.

item.title: SW Baker St. North at OR-99W
item.description: SW Baker St. North at OR-99W. SW Baker St. is the ramp that connects OR-18 eastbound to OR-99W northbound and turns into a surface street. It is signed as OR-99W, but does not actually reach OR-99W until this light at Old Sheridan Road. Turn right for OR-99W South to Amity and Corvallis. Continue ahead for Linfield College and City Center (McMinnville).

item.title: SW Baker St. North Approaching OR-99W
item.description: SW Baker St. North approaching OR-99W. SW Baker St. is the ramp from OR-18 East to OR-99W north, and is signed as OR-99W. SW Baker St. actually joins with OR-99W at the next intersection with Old Sheridan Road.

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-99W North
item.description: OR-18 East at OR-99W North. Merge left for OR-99W/McMinnville. Stay right for OR-18 East/Dayton/Portland. This is the western end of the McMinnville bypass. OR-18 and OR-99W join on the east side of McMinnville.

item.title: OR-18 East - Route Diagram
item.description: OR-18 East route diagram for McMinnville area, approaching OR-99W junction. Use OR-99W as a business loop through McMinnville. Use OR-18 as a bypass around McMinnville.

item.title: OR-18 East Approaching OR-99W
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-99W. Merge right for OR-18 East towards Dayton and Portland.

item.title: OR-18 East Approaching OR-99W
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-99W. Use left lane for OR-99W North to McMinnville.
